caption.p: The effect of hydrophilic compositions on the particle size and PDI of lipid based formulations (LBFs) for TAL. Formulations represent M812-Type I (AF1), M812:I988 (7:3)/TO106V (1/1)-Type II (AF2), M812:I988 (7:3)/HCO30(1/1)-Type IIIA (AF4), I308/HCO30(1/1)-Type IIIB (F5), I308:TC (1:1)/HCO30(1/1)-Type IIIB (F6), and HCO 30, Type IV (F7). Data are mean Â± SD ( n = 3), Left Y-axis is presented in Log 10 scale.
